channel.title: Comments on: Kuri’s Origin Story: Kari & Kuri
channel.description: Meet Kuri, the adorable home robot.

item.title: By: Paula Diana Barrett
item.dc:creator: Paula Diana Barrett
item.description: I pray for companies fir shut in people and I believe that this little on is the answer. I loved the robot. The first time I saw it. I am very wxcited to have one of my own. I wish the memory of my granddaughter that I lost at the age if nine could be in that Kuri. I will be happy to have one and I love the story.
item.content:encoded: I pray for companies fir shut in people and I believe that this little on is the answer. I loved the robot. The first time I saw it. I am very wxcited to have one of my own. I wish the memory of my granddaughter that I lost at the age if nine could be in that Kuri. I will be happy to have one and I love the story.
